title: Coffee Cocktails
description: We love a coffee cocktail and today we’re sharing our best recipes, including the Espresso Martini, White Russian and The Bushwacker. If you’ve never tried a Colorado Bulldog we hope you do. The flavors of coffee and espresso mix so well in cocktails. More classic cocktails: Gimlet, French Martini, Kir Royale, Manhattan, Brandy Alexander, Old…
author: Elsie Larson
excerpt: Our best coffee cocktail recipes! From the Irish Coffee to the White Russian, Espresso Martini and more! Our best coffee cocktails.
text: We love a coffee cocktail and today we’re sharing our best recipes, including the Espresso Martini, White Russian and The Bushwacker. If you’ve never tried a Colorado Bulldog we hope you do. The flavors of coffee and espresso mix so well in cocktails. More classic cocktails: Gimlet, French Martini, Kir Royale, Manhattan, Brandy Alexander, Old Fashioned, Pink Squirrel. Espresso Martini Create this iconic espresso martini with just three ingredients: vodka, espresso and Kahlúa with the optional ingredient of simple syrup. Prep time is only five minutes! Colorado Bulldog Learn to make a Colorado Bulldog cocktail at home. A Colorado Bulldog tastes like a White Russian with the added flavor, sweetness and fizz of cola. Mudslide Learn to make a Mudslide cocktail using vodka, Kahlua, Bailey's Irish Cream and heavy cream. A dessert cocktail!  Mind Eraser Learn to make a Mind Eraser cocktail using Kahlua and vodka. Coffee Martini Learn to make a classic Coffee Martini using brewed coffee, vodka, coffee liqueur and Irish cream liqueur.  Irish Coffee Irish coffee, a delightful blend of coffee, Irish whiskey, sugar, and whipped cream, is a classic beverage that is so delicious. B-52 Shot Learn to make a B-52 shot (or cocktail) using Kahlua, Bailey's and Grand Marnier orange liqueur. Set on fire to serve (optional).  Bushwacker Learn to make a Bushwacker cocktail using dark rum, coffee liqueur, creme de cacao, cream of coconut, whole milk and ice. Non-Dairy White Russian Cocktail Can’t have dairy? Don’t worry we got you covered. This white Russian is made with vodka, coffee liqueur and cashew cream. Duck Fart Shot Learn to make a Duck Fart Shot using Kahula coffee liqueur, Bailey's Irish cream liqueur and whiskey. You'll enjoy this tasty recipe!  White Russian This drink is perfect for an after dinner drink. This three ingredient cocktail is easy to master and serve at home. It uses vodka, Kahlua and heavy cream. Black Russian Have you tried a Black Russian cocktail? It’s a spirit forward, classic cocktail made with vodka, and Kahlua. Cinnamon Girl Cocktail Everyone loves this surprising drink, and we think you’ll love it too! It’s simple enough to make with Kahlua, rum, cream of coconut, orange, pineapple juice, and cinnamon. Pudding Shots You only need four ingredients to make these creamy pudding shots that are perfect for your next party or holiday event. Those ingredients are instant pudding mix, milk, alcohol, and Cool Whip. Tiramisu OK, so this is not a cocktail, but it IS a dessert recipe that uses Kahlúa coffee liqueur. It’s got layers of cake soaked in coffee and rum with creamy, custard-like layers in between. This no-bake dessert is well known and much beloved. Pumpkin Spice White Russian This cocktail is great for autumn time. Made with vodka, Bailey’s, half and half, pumpkin spice syrup, and agave. Peppermint White Russian Add a fun twist on the classic cocktail for the holiday season. Made with Kahlua, peppermint vodka, and half and half. More Recipes to Try: Coffee Recipes – 40+ Coffee Recipes to Try Breakfast & Brunch – 50+ Healthy Breakfast Ideas Bailey’s Irish Cream Cocktail Recipes
html:
We love a coffee cocktail and today we’re sharing our best recipes, including the Espresso Martini, White Russian and The Bushwacker. If you’ve never tried a Colorado Bulldog we hope you do. The flavors of coffee and espresso mix so well in cocktails.

More classic cocktails: Gimlet, French Martini, Kir Royale, Manhattan, Brandy Alexander, Old Fashioned, Pink Squirrel.

Espresso Martini

Create this iconic espresso martini with just three ingredients: vodka, espresso and Kahlúa with the optional ingredient of simple syrup. Prep time is only five minutes!

Colorado Bulldog

Learn to make a Colorado Bulldog cocktail at home. A Colorado Bulldog tastes like a White Russian with the added flavor, sweetness and fizz of cola.

Mudslide

Learn to make a Mudslide cocktail using vodka, Kahlua, Bailey's Irish Cream and heavy cream. A dessert cocktail! 

Mind Eraser

Learn to make a Mind Eraser cocktail using Kahlua and vodka.

Coffee Martini

Learn to make a classic Coffee Martini using brewed coffee, vodka, coffee liqueur and Irish cream liqueur. 

Irish Coffee

Irish coffee, a delightful blend of coffee, Irish whiskey, sugar, and whipped cream, is a classic beverage that is so delicious.

B-52 Shot

Learn to make a B-52 shot (or cocktail) using Kahlua, Bailey's and Grand Marnier orange liqueur. Set on fire to serve (optional). 

Bushwacker

Learn to make a Bushwacker cocktail using dark rum, coffee liqueur, creme de cacao, cream of coconut, whole milk and ice.

Non-Dairy White Russian Cocktail

Can’t have dairy? Don’t worry we got you covered. This white Russian is made with vodka, coffee liqueur and cashew cream.

Duck Fart Shot

Learn to make a Duck Fart Shot using Kahula coffee liqueur, Bailey's Irish cream liqueur and whiskey. You'll enjoy this tasty recipe! 

White Russian

This drink is perfect for an after dinner drink. This three ingredient cocktail is easy to master and serve at home. It uses vodka, Kahlua and heavy cream.

Black Russian

Have you tried a Black Russian cocktail? It’s a spirit forward, classic cocktail made with vodka, and Kahlua.

Cinnamon Girl Cocktail

Everyone loves this surprising drink, and we think you’ll love it too! It’s simple enough to make with Kahlua, rum, cream of coconut, orange, pineapple juice, and cinnamon.

Pudding Shots

You only need four ingredients to make these creamy pudding shots that are perfect for your next party or holiday event. Those ingredients are instant pudding mix, milk, alcohol, and Cool Whip.

Tiramisu

OK, so this is not a cocktail, but it IS a dessert recipe that uses Kahlúa coffee liqueur. It’s got layers of cake soaked in coffee and rum with creamy, custard-like layers in between. This no-bake dessert is well known and much beloved.

Pumpkin Spice White Russian

This cocktail is great for autumn time. Made with vodka, Bailey’s, half and half, pumpkin spice syrup, and agave.

Peppermint White Russian

Add a fun twist on the classic cocktail for the holiday season. Made with Kahlua, peppermint vodka, and half and half.

More Recipes to Try:

  • Coffee Recipes – 40+ Coffee Recipes to Try
  • Breakfast & Brunch – 50+ Healthy Breakfast Ideas
  • Bailey’s Irish Cream Cocktail Recipes
